This is a young neighborhood, and you may encounter some instances of behavior that could be construed as "party", I.e loud music, drinking, incoherent girls stumbling barefoot down the sidewalk while their dates retrieve their footwear and attempt to steer them towards home... The street has it's own security people and they don't take kindly to loiterers . They are, however, quite helpful in emergencies (most of the time).
